data.text:
The Magma area in the PCE-CD version of Valis I

World:

Dark world

Appearances:

Valis I (MD/Genesis and PCE-CD versions only)

Also known as:

Volcano area, Magma caves

The Magma area is a location of the Valis series.

Description[]

An underground heat cave filled with lava and magma rivers and cascades, laberinthic passages, burning traps and many Rogles's soldiers. It served as Venon's base during the events of Valis I. While in the Mega Drive/Genesis version Yuuko went through this area willingly, in the PCE-CD version she had to overcome this area in order to escape from the underground maze where Rogles sent her as a trap.

Appearances[]

The Magma area appeared in Valis I's Mega Drive/Genesis version and PCE-CD version. While in the first mentioned version It appears as the third level, in the PCE-CD version this area appears as the fourth level.

Bosses[]

Valis I[]

Venon
